name: Mina The Hollower GBC Demake
description:
Mina The Hollower GBC Demake

This is not the official Mina the Hollower demo from Yacht Club Games. This is a Game Boy Color demake of the first few screens of the demo I made for the Mina The Hollower art contest.

Due to the limitations of GBStudio the jumping and collision detection can be a bit buggy sometimes. 

For information about the original game by Yacht Club Games visit the Mina The Hollower Website.

Controls
Game Boy:
Movement -> D-Pad
Attack -> B-Button
Jump -> A-Button
Hollow -> Hold A-Button

Web:
Movement -> WASD or Arrow Keys
Attack -> Z or J Key
Jump -> K or X Key
Hollow -> Hold K or X Key

Fonts
Alagard by Pix3M
m6x11 by Daniel Linssen
